title: v6.1.0: After network isolation is recovered, QPS drops more than 50% due to high commit log duration
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
v6.1.0 GA

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
8core\16G 
4 tikvs

### Steps to reproduce
run tpcc
Inject a tikv disconnection and recover it after 50 minutes

### What did you expect?
QPS can not drop too much

### What did happened?
more details see https://internal.pingcap.net/jira/projects/INCALL/issues/INCALL-106
https://clinic.pingcap.com.cn/portal/#/orgs/31/clusters/7116448296305065735?from=1656926856&to=1656955605
